description_for_human: Security scanning for AI agent skills â€” 7 threat categories, prompt injection detection, trust badges.
description_for_model: PYX Scanner analyzes AI agent skills for security threats. It scans for data exfiltration, destructive commands, secret access, obfuscation, prompt injection, social engineering, and excessive permissions. Each skill receives a trust score from 0-100 and a verified/failed status. Use the badge API at /api/v1/badge/{owner}/{name} to get SVG trust badges. Browse skills at /browse or check individual skills at /s/{owner}/{name}.
